original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role is a fusion of strategic business acumen and technical proficiency, where you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations. As a key player, you will ensure our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate at peak efficiency. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative processes that leverage technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to swiftly craft tailored solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools.
- Spearhead initiatives to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices.
- Rigorously test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Collaborate seamlessly with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to tackle complex challenges and devise innovative solutions.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, with a strong understanding of database management and data manipulation techniques.
- Hands-on experience in implementing and optimizing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions.

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in software development and project management.
- Demonstrated experience in the vehicle configuration domain, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements.

Required Experience:
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in implementing and optimizing ML and AI solutions in a professional setting.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and leveraging Agile methodologies to drive successful project delivery.
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration industry, with a proven track record of enhancing business processes and system efficiency.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using data analysis and visualization tools, such as SQL, Excel, and Tableau.
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools, like Jira and Confluence, to effectively plan, track, and document project activities.
- Experience in working with configuration management and version control systems, such as Git, to ensure the integrity and traceability of system configurations.

This role is a unique blend of strategic business acumen and technical expertise, where you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into efficient and effective system configurations. As a key member of the team, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect the evolving needs of the business and operate at optimal efficiency. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative processes that leverage cutting-edge technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to deliver tailored and rapid solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business needs, gather comprehensive requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques such as user stories, use cases, and detailed process flows.
- Seamlessly translate these business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining comprehensive configuration specifications, creating and modifying complex data mappings and integrations, implementing and thoroughly testing new configurations, and swiftly resolving any configuration-related issues.
- Conduct in-depth analyses of existing data to identify trends, uncover inefficiencies, and pinpoint areas for improvement, leveraging advanced database querying, sophisticated reporting, and cutting-edge data visualization tools.
- Spearhead strategic initiatives to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the implementation of innovative configuration changes and the adoption of industry-leading best practices.
- Rigorously test configurations to ensure they not only meet but exceed requirements and function flawlessly, actively leading and participating in comprehensive user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain meticulous documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and enable seamless future enhancements.
- Collaborate seamlessly with developers, IT support, and other key stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and continuous, high-quality support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to tackle complex challenges and devise innovative, data-driven solutions.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, with a deep understanding of database management and advanced data manipulation techniques.
- Proven expertise in the implementation and optimization of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions, with a strong track record of delivering tangible business impact.

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in software development and project management, with the ability to adapt and thrive in a fast-paced, iterative environment.
- Demonstrated experience in the vehicle configuration domain, with a comprehensive understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements.

Required Experience:
- Minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience in implementing and optimizing ML and AI solutions in a professional setting, with a proven track record of driving meaningful business outcomes.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and leveraging Agile methodologies to successfully deliver complex projects.
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration industry, with a proven ability to enhance business processes and drive system efficiency improvements.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using advanced data analysis and visualization tools, such as SQL, Excel, Tableau, and Power BI, to extract insights and communicate findings effectively.
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools, like Jira and Confluence, to plan, track, and document project activities in a structured and transparent manner.
- Experience in working with robust configuration management and version control systems, such as Git, to ensure the integrity and traceability of system configurations.
